website_summaries.verdict: For planes, cars, or boats, Dramamine works when taken preemptively or when sickness strikes.
pros: Dimenhydrinate 50mg swallow tablets is a great remedy for severe motion sickness
The packaging makes it easy to bring these pills anywhere
cons: Some customers did not find these tablets to be effective if not taken before travel

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love the individual packaged tablets. It makes it so easy to slip into my purse. As a cancer patient who gets vertigo, these are my best friend some days. I cannot say enough about how well these work, how much I appreciate a product like this. I'm a mom, I have a job, I have a very understanding husband, without these some days I cannot get off the couch. They work so fast on nausea, and my dizziness!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend giving them about 30 minutes before you plan to ...
customer_reviews.text: Dramamine is the only brand of motion sickness pills that keeps my son from getting car sick. Bonine and Meclizine do nothing for him. I do recommend giving them about 30 minutes before you plan to leave. My little guy began getting severely car sick when he was just a baby. Nothing seemed to help him. Even driving 10 miles away meant bringing the poor kid a change of clothes and lots of baby wipes, air freshener, etc. So long as I give him this 30 minutes before leaving, he does fine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works I bought it because I play a lot of VR games and VR gives me insanely nauseous. But once I take these I feel I can play for days without feeling sick. Highly recommend this for anyone who wants to get into VR gaming but can't deal with the nausea.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXANDER ZUCKERMAN

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I love fishing and went to a charter in Westport last year and got sick for like 2.5 hours. Luckily I was only sick for the trip to the fishing spot and was fine to fish after. So this year I bought these had 1 the day before the trip and 2 before each charter trip and was totally fine. Not a hint of nausea. They really work!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must-have for someone suffering from pregnancy morning sickness. Did wonders
customer_reviews.author: P L

customer_reviews.title: Chewable Dramamine
customer_reviews.text: Chewable is easier for me though the taste is pretty nasty to me. Works quickly, which is very helpful since I usually forget to take until last minute before hitting the road. I keep these at all times!
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My wife's migraine attacks have an important emetic component, and only dimenhydrinate controls it. The chewable formulation was a great idea, since there is no need for water to take the pill (she would pew that small amount of water with the pill included). It was a saver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old who tends to get carsick on long trips. I gave it to them about 15 minutes before we left the house, and for the first time in years they didn’t get sick! This is going to have a permanent spot in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Best for relief
customer_reviews.text: Good to use if you have cancer or nausea and imbalance I’ve always used this instead of high end drugs will make you drowsy but nausea quits fast nothing else has worked for me love it

customer_reviews.title: Helps My MIGRAINES! Try it -
customer_reviews.text: I discovered years ago that these work great for my MIGRAINES. I keep them in my wallet and take at 1st symptoms. My daughter started having migraines in high school. Dramamine also works for her. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: ALBA G

customer_reviews.title: Works great. We were all sea sick and felt much ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We were all sea sick and felt much better after taking the recommended dose. This product truly works and does so even if you are already sea sick.
customer_reviews.author: D&R

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have a hard time swallowing pills I love the fact these are chewable. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids , not too bad tasting

customer_reviews.title: The best non-drowsy medication in the world.
customer_reviews.text: This motion sickness treatment is by far the best on the market. Easy to take and highly effective for all types of motion sickness, especially on the water. I had had so much success on boats, in cars, on planes and even rollercoasters with no ill-feelings following. I did notice that it did sometimes slur my speech, but maybe you shouldn't miz with alcohol ;)

customer_reviews.title: Great product  in a convenient form.
customer_reviews.text: Never leave home without it! I suffer from motion sickness if I turn around too fast and this stuff works all the time. I carry the chewables in every purse I have and they've saved me (and others!) Even the choppy waters of the SF Bay were tamed!

customer_reviews.title: So nice to not need water to take!

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is good! First I had Kidney stones. It helps with the stent afterwards. Then I got some more because I found a really nice side effect to them. It helps me to get me more into a Dream State. The reason that I only gave it a 4 was because the stupid packaging is really hard to open.

customer_reviews.title: Fast acting
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my 40s and have suffered from motion sickness my entire life. I find these chewables work faster than the tablets you swallow. My kids take them as well!

customer_reviews.title: ... can I say it's the real Dramamine and works great. I love to chew (as a toddler I ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it's the real Dramamine and works great. I love to chew (as a toddler I ate a whole bottle of baby aspirin) so the chewable formula is great.

customer_reviews.text: My two youngest kiddos get motion sickness in the car if the ride is longer than 30 minutes. This product really takes care of the issue although it does make them a little bit drowsy. We never travel without it!

customer_reviews.title: It was also recommended to me to take the night before surgery to ...
customer_reviews.text: I think everyone knows about Dramamine...if you don't and you get motion sickness (car, plane, train, boat or otherwise) this product is a God send! It was also recommended to me to take the night before surgery to avoid poor anesthesia reactions (And increase recovery time from it...I would definitely speak to your dr before using it for this purpose). It did help me immensely on a whale watching boat trip in choppy waters. Tried and true...Dramamine is a great product.

customer_reviews.text: Works every time! I get sea sick and car sick and this product works very well.

customer_reviews.text: Went to an amusement park on vacation and my husband very easily gets motion sickness. Worked as described!

customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Most effective and versatile for body sensitivity issues
customer_reviews.text: We we rely on this. Not even kidding. It is by far the most effective for diminishing motion sicknesses. I have also found it helps enormously well with nausea as well as increased smell sensitivity. For instance, when I have a stomach ache in reaction to medication, I take this so that I can tolerate the medicine without feeling sick. And when smells are making me ill, I take this and it immediately makes my day more tolerable. It makes me able to go about my work without feeling sick at every smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: The right taste and it works
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my kids have huge complaints against every flavor but orange and orange is pretty hard to find in the stores. So that's nice. Past that, the stuff works. Being two hours into a four hour road trip and having the kids puking is really no fun. It's worth a lot to not have to worry about that.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: ... booked to go on a cage dive with some great white sharks off the coast of South Africa
customer_reviews.text: Was booked to go on a cage dive with some great white sharks off the coast of South Africa. They call the area Cape of Storms, and sure enough the day I booked for was meant to be rainy with 9 meter waves. I've never been sea sick before but I didn't want to take chance that this would be the first time. Took some the night before and hour before our excursion. I was one of the ONLY PEOPLE who did not get sea sick on the boat including others who swore they have never been sick at sea.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to have with you in your wallet or travel ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to have with you in your wallet or travel bag. Great to have when you don't have a beverage handy, or when you don't want to deal with the horrible bitter taste of regular motion sickness tablets. They are a bit gritty and can leave particles in your teeth but nothing too bothersome.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have in my life!
customer_reviews.text: For someone who suffers from nausea and insomnia, this is the mildest way to avoid meds. Chewable is key as well. Taste good, and one goes a long way... Most of all, they are pricey in stores, and here online, or better yet if you have Sub & Save Subscription, they are half the price!

customer_reviews.title: Great, but I recommend the non-drowsy formula
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I would recommend getting the non-drowsy formula, unless you're not going to a place where you need to be sociable. Took one before going to my fiance's family Christmas and was falling asleep the whole time.

customer_reviews.title: Works well! A little too well...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a fishing trip I was going on. Took roughly 45 min before taking off. Worked like a charm! One another fishing trip, decided that its time to take it again because it worked so well the first time. Unfortunately for me, I was unaware that I should only take it if I was to be expecting to be sick. The water was really smooth and had no need for it, and ended up being really drowsy, which is a side effect of this. Now I know to not just take it "just because", but to wait until I believe I may need it, Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: David Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I hope Amazon ALWAYS carries this!

I get some minor motion sickness when I fly and sometimes in the car. I am always sure to have some on hand and Amazon is the only place I can find it for a reasonable price and really, the only place besides the air port which charges about $4.00 for 2 pills!

product_meta.title: Dramamine Chewable Formula Motion Sickness Relief | Orange | 8 Count
product_meta.description: From the #1 Pharmacist Recommended brand, Dramamine Chewable Formula delivers all the relief of Dramamine Original Formula in a great tasting orange flavored tablet. It treats motion sickness symptoms on the spot, preventing nausea, dizziness and vomiting. Always bring Dramamine with you! You don't want to be caught in the air, on the water, or on the road without Dramamine. Depending on the cause, motion sickness is also referred to as airsickness, carsickness or seasickness. Here are some tips to help: 1. Whether on a cruise ship, a jetliner or a sailboat—the middle of the vessel tends to be the steadiest. Stay mid boat at sea or reserve a seat over the wings when flying to avoid too many nauseating ups and downs. 2. If you know you are going on a rocky ocean fishing adventure or helicopter tour that is likely to cause motion sickness, take Dramamine BEFORE boarding. Dramamine works best when taken as a precautionary measure. It also eases motion sickness after the fact, but why risk getting sick? 3. Take a turn at the wheel. Driving the car or small watercraft may distract you from feeling nauseous. Ask your friends if you can act as a captain. If you begin to feel motion sick and can’t drive, at least sit in the front seat. You’ll feel better if you can face the direction in which you’re headed and stare at a non moving object. 4. Steer clear of fumes. Ferryboats, in particular, seem to chug out a lot of stinky exhaust that can make a seagoer go from slightly motion sick to all out nauseated. 5. Toast your besties with a glass of bubbly ginger ale or stick to bottled water and focus on staying hydrated. Avoid alcohol, which can increase dehydration and nausea. Not only is Dramamine the most trusted over the counter treatment for motion sickness, it is the #1 Pharmacist Recommended brand to both prevent and treat the condition.
feature_bullets: Powerful, fast relief from motion sickness when you need it most
Treats and prevents nausea, dizziness and vomiting
Great tasting orange flavored chewable tablets
